## Installation

**sealr** is not available on CRAN. So, install from GitHub.

```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("uribo/sealr")
```

## How to use

```{r, eval = TRUE, echo = TRUE}
library(sealr)
```

```{r, warning = FALSE}
my_data <- mtcars

transcribe(iris) %>% 
  seal()

transcribe(my_data) %>% 
  seal()
```


- `transcribe()`
- `seal()`
